intro: Aganisia venusta, commonly known as the elegant aganisia, is a species of flowering plant native to the Caribbean. It belongs to the family Malvaceae, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its showy, pentagonal flowers that range in color from white to pink. Its leaves are palmately lobed and often have a velvety texture. Aganisia venusta is typically found growing in coastal areas and is adapted to saline environments.
